entry.title: FREEZING DRIZZLE ADVISORY , Ignace
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 2:11 PM CST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mist, -1.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Dryden Airport 2:03 PM CST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of freezing drizzle. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of freezing drizzle or flurries. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Periods of freezing drizzle. High zero.
entry.summary: Periods of freezing drizzle or a few flurries changing to periods of snow in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High zero. Wind chill minus 3 in the morning. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 15 January 2023
